items.title: Murderer and fellow inmate who absconded from prison are caught
items.description: Murderer Matthew Armstrong and Daniel Washbourne are arrested on suspicion of escaping lawful custody.

items.title: Venezuela's interim leader sacks general in charge of Maduro's guard
items.description: General Javier Marcano TÃ¡bata was the commander of the inner circle of guards tasked with protecting Maduro.

items.title: UK viewers warm up for steamy ice hockey hit Heated Rivalry
items.description: The latest word-of-mouth hit arrives in the UK after setting pulses racing across the Atlantic.

items.title: How new road safety measures could affect you
items.description: The government is proposing lowering alcohol limits for drivers and regular eye tests for older motorists.

items.title: Police told wrong family teen had died in crash
items.description: South Yorkshire Police says it mixed up the identities of the teen with another male in the car.
